# Example

## `window()` function

```{r}
window(2, c = 3, min = 1, max = 9)

# 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9  
# |---c---|
# 1 2 3 4 5
```

```{r}
window(3, c = 8, min = 1, max = 9)

# 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9  
#         |-----c-----|
#         5 6 7 8 9
```
